attributes.action: give sixth form, college and university students FREE bus passes to get to and from classes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All students, whether in higher or further education should recieve free bus passes anually from the council. It is unfair to expect those of us who have decided to stay on to further education to be expected to pay over £140 per term for a bus pass! It's obsurd. We should be given similar passes to those that OAP's recieve because those of us who have part-time jobs (on top of our difficult, time-consuming studies) only earn the minimum wage and therefore can barely afford the bus fare.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
